Control Flow 0.flow_desc: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn

Control Flow 1.flow_desc: Start a loop code flow, with multiple subtasks performed iteratively

Stage 0.Title: generate_initial_output
Stage 0.Objectives: Systematically apply logical reasoning to each candidate input, producing an initial documented output

Control Flow 2.flow_desc: End of current loop code flow

Stage 1.Title: aggregate_candidates
Stage 1.Objectives: Combine multiple candidate outputs into a single, unified, optimized result

Stage 2.Title: isolate_components
Stage 2.Objectives: Identify and extract specific components from the unified result for downstream processing

Stage 3.Title: validate_and_assess
Stage 3.Objectives: Perform validation and quality assessment to ensure each element meets correctness, consistency, and predefined quality standards

Stage 4.Title: refine_content (optional)
Stage 4.Objectives: Optionally enhance verified content for clarity, coherence, and presentation quality

Stage 5.Title: format_output
Stage 5.Objectives: Transform the finalized content into the designated final format and presentation style according to requirements

Control Flow 3.flow_desc: End of current sequential code flow

Control Flow 0.flow_desc: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn

Control Flow 1.flow_desc: Start a loop code flow, with multiple subtasks performed iteratively

Stage 0.Title: generate_initial_output
Stage 0.Objectives: Generate an initial output by systematically applying logical reasoning steps to the given input within a loop

Control Flow 2.flow_desc: End of current loop code flow

Stage 1.Title: aggregate_candidates
Stage 1.Objectives: Combine multiple candidate inputs by evaluating their alignment and quality to produce a single, unified, and optimized output

Stage 2.Title: validate_element
Stage 2.Objectives: Optional: Evaluate a given element against defined correctness and consistency criteria to determine its validity or accuracy

Stage 3.Title: isolate_and_validate_components
Stage 3.Objectives: Identify and isolate specific components from the merged output and confirm they satisfy predefined criteria or standards (merges subtasks 5, 6, and 2)

Stage 4.Title: refine_and_finalize_output
Stage 4.Objectives: Refine and enhance information clarity, perform quality assessment against standards, and transform the result into the designated final format (merges subtasks 9, 10, and 3)

Control Flow 3.flow_desc: End of current sequential code flow

Stage 1.Title: start loop
Stage 1.Objectives: Initiate a loop for iterative processing of subtask 4

Stage 2.Title: generate_initial_output
Stage 2.Objectives: Systematically apply logical reasoning to produce an initial output (Subtask 4)

Stage 3.Title: end loop
Stage 3.Objectives: Conclude the loop of initial output generation

Stage 4.Title: aggregate_candidates
Stage 4.Objectives: Combine and optimize multiple candidate inputs into a unified output (Subtask 0)

Stage 5.Title: validate_element
Stage 5.Objectives: Check each element for correctness and consistency (Subtask 7)

Stage 6.Title: Enhance Information Clarity and Quality Assessment
Stage 6.Objectives: Refine clarity and coherence, then assess against quality standards (Subtasks 9 & 10 merged)

Stage 7.Title: validate_entities
Stage 7.Objectives: Verify that identified entities meet predefined criteria (Subtask 6)

Stage 8.Title: format_output
Stage 8.Objectives: Transform the validated output into the final specified format (Subtask 3)

Control Flow 0.flow_desc: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn

Control Flow 1.flow_desc: Start a loop code flow, with multiple subtasks performed iterately

Stage 0.Title: generate_initial_output
Stage 0.Objectives: Generate an initial output by systematically applying logical reasoning steps to given input and documenting the reasoning process.

Control Flow 2.flow_desc: End of current loop code flow

Stage 1.Title: aggregate_candidates
Stage 1.Objectives: Combine multiple candidate inputs by evaluating their alignment and quality to produce a single, unified, and optimized output.

Stage 2.Title: isolate_components
Stage 2.Objectives: Identify and isolate specific components or elements from a given input for further use or processing.

Stage 3.Title: validate_entities
Stage 3.Objectives: Evaluate identified entities to confirm they satisfy predefined criteria or standards.

Stage 4.Title: validate_element
Stage 4.Objectives: Evaluate a given element against defined correctness and consistency criteria to determine its validity or accuracy.

Stage 5.Title: quality_assessment
Stage 5.Objectives: Perform an evaluation of a refined or processed output to verify that it meets predefined quality criteria and standards.

Stage 6.Title: detect_gaps
Stage 6.Objectives: Analyze a given output or solution to identify any missing, incomplete, or inconsistent elements relative to specified requirements or criteria.

Stage 7.Title: format_output
Stage 7.Objectives: Transform and refine an input artifact into a specified output format and presentation style according to predefined guidelines.

Control Flow 3.flow_desc: End of current sequential code flow

Control Flow 3.flow_desc: Start a conditional code flow, with `true branch` flow and `false branch` flow include many subtasks for each branch

Control Flow 4.flow_desc: Included in conditional branch, wrap many subtasks that are implemented if condition = true

Stage 3.Title: fill_gaps
Stage 3.Objectives: Generate supplementary content to complete or enhance existing information by addressing identified gaps or missing details.

Control Flow 5.flow_desc: End of current true branch code flow

Control Flow 6.flow_desc: Included in conditional branch, wrap many subtasks that are implemented if condition = false

Stage 4.Title: isolate_components
Stage 4.Objectives: Identify and isolate specific components or elements from a given input for further use or processing.

Control Flow 7.flow_desc: End of current false branch code flow

Control Flow 8.flow_desc: End of current conditional code flow

Stage 5.Title: disambiguate_elements
Stage 5.Objectives: Identify and resolve ambiguities among a set of elements to ensure each element is clearly defined, distinct, and unambiguous.

Stage 6.Title: validate_entities
Stage 6.Objectives: Evaluate identified entities to confirm they satisfy predefined criteria or standards.

Stage 7.Title: Verify Element Consistency and Accuracy
Stage 7.Objectives: Evaluate an element against defined criteria to verify its consistency, accuracy, and correctness.

Stage 8.Title: refine_content
Stage 8.Objectives: Refine verified content to enhance clarity, coherence, and presentation quality.

Stage 9.Title: quality_assessment
Stage 9.Objectives: Perform an evaluation of a refined or processed output to verify that it meets predefined quality criteria and standards.

Stage 10.Title: format_output
Stage 10.Objectives: Transform a validated or finalized input into a designated final format, structure, or presentation according to specified requirements.
